title: My Father Is Omnipotent

author.name: Ira F. Stanphill
author.bio: Ira F. Stanphill was a well-known American gospel songwriter and musician.

lyrics:
My Father is omnipotent
And that you can't deny
A God of might and miracles
'Tis written in the sky.

CHORUS:
It took a miracle
To put the stars in place
It took a miracle
To hang the world in space
But when He saved my soul,
Cleansed and made me whole
It took a miracle
Of love and grace.

Though here His glory
Has been shown
We still can't fully see
The wonders of His might,
His throne,
'Twill take eternity.

The Bible tells us of His power
And wisdom all way through
And every little bird and flower
Are testimonies too.
